comments: The function T(n,k) = T(k,n) is defined for k>n but only the values for 1<=k<=n as a triangular array are listed here.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, More information
mathematica: T[ n_, k_] := If[ n < 1 || k < 1, 0, 2^GCD[ n, k] - 1] (* _Michael Somos_, Jul 18 2011 *)
prog: (PARI) {T(n, k) = if( n<1 || k<1, 0, 2^gcd(n, k) - 1)} /* _Michael Somos_, Jul 18 2011 */
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
